浮塵子: (ウンカ) - plant hopper (any insect of family Delphacidae); leafhopper
浮寝: (うきね) - sleeping in a ship; sleeping on the surface of the water (of a bird); restless sleep; casually sleeping together (e.g. unmarried couple)
浮寝鳥: (うきねどり) - waterfowl sleeping while floating on water
浮屠: (ふと) - Buddha; stupa; Buddhist temple; Buddhist monk
浮岩: (うきいわ) - rock partially submerged in water/rock partially emerging from the water; pumice stone
浮島: (うきじま) - floating mass (of waterweeds, ice, etc.); floating island (mirage)
浮彫: (うきぼり) - relief/embossed carving; bringing to the fore/throwing something into relief
浮彫り: (うきぼり) - relief/embossed carving; bringing to the fore/throwing something into relief
浮心: (ふしん) - center of buoyancy; centre of buoyancy
浮橋: (うきはし) - floating bridge; pontoon bridge
浮気: (uwaki) - sexo extraconjugal, caso, brincadeira; infidelidade, libertinagem, deslealdade, inconstância, volubilidade, capricho
浮気心: (うわきごころ) - cheating heart; temptation to cheat on one's partner
浮気性: (うわきしょう) - prone to adultery; flirtatious
浮気症: (うわきしょう) - prone to adultery; flirtatious
浮気相手: (うわきあいて) - adulterous partner (in a relationship); adulterous lover
浮気者: (うわきもの) - cheater; unfaithful person; adulterer
浮氷: (ふひょう) - ice floe; floating ice; pack ice
浮沈: (ふちん) - floating and sinking; rise and fall; ebb and flow; ups and downs
浮環: (うきわ) - swim ring; (rubber) swimming ring; life buoy; life belt; float
浮矢幹: (ウキヤガラ) - Scirpus yagara (species of club-rush)
浮矢柄: (ウキヤガラ) - Scirpus yagara (species of club-rush)
浮石: (うきいし) - pumice stone; loose rock/loose stone; floating group (in the game of go)/group without a base
浮腫む: (むくむ) - to swell; to become swollen; to be puffy (e.g. face from lack of sleep); to be bloated (esp. from fluid retention)
浮腰: (うきごし) - wavering/unsteady; floating hip throw (judo)
浮草: (うきくさ) - floating weed; greater duckweed (Spirodela polyrhiza); precarious/unstable
浮草稼業: (うきぐさかぎょう) - precarious trade; unstable occupation; itinerant trade
浮薄: (ふはく) - frivolous; fickle; insincere; caprice; cold-heartedness
浮袋: (うきぶくろ) - swimming belt/swimming float/life buoy/life jacket; swim bladder/air bladder
浮足: (うきあし) - standing on the balls of the feet/unsteady step/unstable stance; having one's feet off the ground/reeling (from)/swept away (by)/in an ecstasy (of)
浮足立つ: (うきあしだつ) - to be prepared to flee; to become restless; to become agitated
浮輪: (うきわ) - swim ring; (rubber) swimming ring; life buoy; life belt; float
浮造: (うづくり) - tool for scrubbing wood to give it texture, traditionally made of dried grass bound together by hemp cord; scrubbing wood to give it texture
浮遊物: (ふゆうぶつ) - suspended particles; floating matter
浮雲: (うきくも) - drifting cloud/floating cloud; instability
浮鮴: (ウキゴリ) - common freshwater goby (Gymnogobius urotaenia); floating goby (Gymnogobius petschiliensis); Gymnogobius opperiens (fish); isaza goby (Gymnogobius isaza)
浴す: (よくす) - to bathe; to receive (an honor, etc.)
浴する: (よくする) - to bathe; to receive (an honor, etc.)
浴びせかける: (あびせかける) - to hurl abuse; to level insults
浴びせ倒し: (あびせたおし) - pushing down (one's opponent) by leaning on (him)
浴びせ掛ける: (あびせかける) - to hurl abuse; to level insults
浴びる: (abiru) - to dash over oneself (ex. água), to take (e.g. shower), to bask in (e.g. the sun), to bathe in, to be flooded with (e.g. light), to be covered in; to suffer (e.g. an attack), to draw (e.g. criticism, attention, praise), to have heaped upon, to be showered with
浴場: (よくじょう) - bath; bathtub; bathhouse; bathroom
浴客: (よっかく) - bather; (hot springs resort) guest
浴舎: (よくしゃ) - rustic bathhouse (esp. at onsen)
浴衣: (yukata) - yukata (kimono de algodão leve usado no verão ou como roupão)
浴衣地: (ゆかたじ) - yukata cloth material; special light woven material 36-40cm wide for making yukata
浴衣掛け: (ゆかたがけ) - wearing a yukata; in one's informal summer kimono
海の家: (うみのいえ) - beach hut; beachside clubhouse
海の幸: (うみのさち) - seafood; products of the sea; marine products; fruits of the sea
海の日: (うみのひ) - Marine Day (national holiday; 3rd Monday of July)
海の物とも山の物とも判らない: (うみのものともやまのものともわからない) - neither fish nor fowl; cannot be foreseen
海の藻屑となる: (うみのもくずとなる) - to be drowned at sea
海の藻屑と消える: (うみのもくずときえる) - to be drowned at sea
海を渡る: (うみをわたる) - to cross the ocean (i.e. to go to or come from overseas)
海イグアナ: (ウミイグアナ) - marine iguana (Amblyrhynchus cristatus)
海パン: (かいパン) - trunks; shorts (e.g. seaside use)
海ワニ: (ウミワニ) - saltwater crocodile (Crocodylus porosus); estuarine crocodile

海上交通安全法: (かいじょうこうつうあんぜんほう) - Maritime Traffic Safety Act
海上保安庁: (かいじょうほあんちょう) - Japan Coast Guard (formerly Maritime Safety Agency)

海上封鎖: (かいじょうふうさ) - sea blockade
